entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce default value for OptimizationPreference #92312
  • [API Proposal]: VectorNNN.Create with broadcasting #92299
    9.0.0
  • First-chance exceptions crashing test runner #92297
  • [8.0] Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.DownloadResourceProgressTests.DownloadProgressFinishes - failed to bind to address http://127.0.0.1:5000 - already in use #92295
  • Publish NativeAOT on Ubuntu doesn't work with -r linux-musl-x64 #92294
  • COM generator seemingly generates invalid code when toggling [GeneratedComInterface] options #92291
  • MSBuild crashing in the build #92290
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for IParsable<Uri> on System.Uri #92285
  • Regression: ZipFile/ZipArchive entry name decoding not working correctly when entryNameEncoding is specified #92283
    9.0.0
  • Better error message for dotnet exec of an app with mismatched architecture #92281
  • AspnetCore application tries to load Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.amd64.dll at runtime on centos linux #92278
    9.0.0
  • Crash w/ Data Annotations Validation - Regression in RC1 #92276
    8.0.0
  • File writing got Permission Denied (13) error on Win10 when the same file is being accessed from a read-only network share at Ubuntu 22.04 LTS #92275
  • .NET 8 RC1: NativeAOT fails to build for linux-bionic-arm64 when specifying project as library (Linker error) #92272
  • NativeAOT's implementation of `TrimmerRootAssembly` is too aggressive #92271
  • Inconsistent behavior between TimeProvider in .NET 8 and .NET 6 during testing #92264
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods with object-param #92262
  • Support xcode 15 #92260
  • ILCompiler doesn't resolve type names for attributes on fields/properties #92259

Closed

  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Dynamic\\Dynamic\\Dynamic.cmd #92202
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Web.Tests.HttpUtilityTest.JavaScriptStringEncode #92246
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsSIMD(vns->TypeOfVN(argVN))' during 'Do value numbering' #91175
    8.0.0
  • .NET Core runtime and desktop runtime bundles need success blocker #54703
    Future
  • Update WiX package dependency #59498
    6.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.Signed.WiX to 1.0.0-v3.14.0.5722 #60003
    6.0.x
  • Some repos do not contribute to third-party-notices file #61466
    8.0.0
  • Dotnet 6.06 install failure #71869
    Future
  • Consider updating tool for updating 3rd-party notices to be smarter about duplicates #74775
    8.0.0
  • Cleanup of third-party-notices files #74779
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op3Reg' during 'Generate code' #91208
    8.0.0
  • Runtimes downloaded from Microsoft repos aren't detected by dotnet due to different installation directory #83950
  • .NET 8 RC1 build fails on Ubuntu ARM64 with "Cannot find mkstemps nor mkstemp on this platform" #92244
  • Inconsistent and counterintuitive codegen behavior of `+` operator for `Vector512<T>` depending on the number and order of operands generated by compare instructions, unlike for `Vector256<T>` #92261
  • Compiler error when using configuration binder source generator with custom collections #91324
  • Assertion failed '(jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 12) || (jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 16) || (jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 32)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91799
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect NRE during operations on structures in method marked with AgressiveOptimization #92218
    8.0.0
  • Configuration-binding source generator error in .NET 8 #92273
  • Http Test hang/failure: MaxConnectionsPerServer_WaitingConnectionsAreCancelable #27256
    Future
  • Test failure: GetAsync_ManyDifferentRequestHeaders_SentCorrectly #25060
    Future
  • Test issue: AllowAutoRedirect_True_PostToGetDoesNotSendTE fails occasionally on WinHttpHandler #25180
    Future
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for attributes on fields/properties/events #92131
    Future
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows test failure #76831
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Disabled cookie tests / retries happen on the same connection #56870
    Future
  • Feature Request: restrict PDB resolution #92227
  • Crash when trying to load an Assembly in a hostfxr environment after calling FreeConsole() #91856
    9.0.0
  • There're two 'EnumCalendarInfoCallback' in System.Private.CoreLib that mono-llvm-PInvoke dont support .. #81813
    9.0.0
  • GetAttributes(bool inherit) inconsistency for new attributes added for keyed services #92242
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Net documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88569
    8.0.0
  • AOT compilation fails when NoWarn spans separate lines #91965
    8.0.0
  • Support direct P/Invokes without an import library. #92140
  • [FromKeyedServices("keyName")] Keyed services support in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection is not resolving dependency in constructor #92076
    8.0.0
  • RandomNumberGenerator bad performance on GetString and possible reason #92130
    Future
  • IEnumerator does not work properly if received directly from a List inside a linq statement #92253
  • Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #90908
    8.0.0
  • ArgIterator apis throwing PlatformNotSupportedException. #7317
    Future
  • Enable support for FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute in collectible classes #11153
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • ICorDebug: Properly handle interior pointers #92313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92311
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Change GetParametersNoCopy to GetParametersSpan and use it in a few more places #92310
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92309
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Don't generate AddMask as it requires more explicit consideration of semantics #92308
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Reimport full spill clique for I_IMPL<->BYREF mismatches #92307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bump version to GA #92305
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary array allocation in JsonHelpers.Utf8GetString on netstandard #92304
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Use JsonSerializer to implement JsonNode.To{Json}String #92302
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Refactor out TargetFramework concept from Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #92301
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #92298
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build the PGO build legs through the global build job template #92296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] JIT: add missing xarch RMW case #92293
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Make a quirk in block morphing more explicit #92292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent restoring illink for native-binplace.proj #92289
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [browser] cleanup for emscripten main in a web worker #92280
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92274
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix downlevel build break in TensorPrimitives #92269
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for indexing by object schema #92268
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods on enums #92263
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi] Fix llvm target triple. #92256
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • Fix optSwitchConvert #92249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure VN handles both forms of the xarch shift instructions for SIMD #91601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move portable RID graph into runtime and clean-up #92211
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't generate AddMask as it requires more explicit consideration of semantics #92282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.IntelliSense package version #92254
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [main] Bump Microsoft.Private.IntelliSense package version #92255
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Remove "Is supported on this TFM" logic from marshalling generators and instead handle it during factory construction #91768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #92277
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • JIT: add missing xarch RMW case #92252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: generalize assert to handle SIMD64 #92235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91917
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Fix naming of MonoEnableLLVM flag in Mono README #92265
  • Add attribute analysis for missing cases in ILLink analyzer #92166
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix downlevel build break in TensorPrimitives #92270
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Bump wasi sdk to 20. #92243
    area-Build-mono
  • Update PACKAGE.md #92225
    area-System.Data
  • [release/8.0] Numerics and Tensors backport #92245
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add xml comments to System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames members #92220
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Move SearchValues scalar loops into IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #91937
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Update solution files #92209
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92250
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2270587 #92258
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #92257
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Address some `SString` const issues #92156
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems for power-of-two choices #92229
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Updated

  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "side car" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unaligned read in ReadUnaligned only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Throw ODE if connection/listener is disposed #92215
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix trimming of DebuggerDisplay with Name #92191
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add missing System.Net.Http.Json comments #92223
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch` silently fails when `launchSettings.json` contains comments #35558
  • Use `packages.lock.json` instead of `project.assets.json`, if available #35556
  • [Containers] Improve container integrations with editors and tools to expand usage #35552
    8.0.2xx
  • APICompat attribute handling inaccurate #35542
    9.0.1xx
  • SDK reports a number of new errors when multi-targeting and enabling AOT/Trim analyzers #35528
  • Failing to publish self-contained app to `linux-bionic-arm64` #35518
  • .NET8 RC1 dotnet tool install <package> does not work when nuget.org is blocked #35517
  • RuntimeIdentifiers `osx.11.0-arm64`, `osx.12-arm64` and `osx.13-arm64` are no longer recognized in .NET 8 RC1 #35516
  • figure out why toolPackageStore return a path with quote #35508

Closed

  • Ubuntu page is not available. #11597
  • Support dotnet tool restore --locked-mode #16003
    Backlog
  • Can not install net core sdk on Yocto-Zeus #18201
  • After updating Fedora 33 to 34 and dotnet 5.0.5 to 5.0.6 I get error regarding libhostfxr.so #17570
  • Add iOS, Android, and macCatalyst into SupportedPlatform with the correct scope #16488
  • .NET developers have an improved containerization experience #31281
    8.0.1xx
  • Add a dotnet install runtime command #7686
    8.0.1xx
  • Enable SxS workload manifest support for file-based installs #34032
  • Update roslyn-analyzers version and remove false-positive suppressions #28672
    8.0.1xx
  • Publish Single-file: Smart settings for IncludeSymbolsInSingleFile #3685
    8.0.1xx
  • `dotnet build` should not publish self-contained when given a runtime identifier #12616
    8.0.1xx
  • Support common output directory root in SDK out of the box #867
    8.0.1xx
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #31134
    8.0.1xx
  • Suspicious use of $(MSBuildAllProjectFiles) in Microsoft.NET.DesignerSupport.targets #23480
    9.0.1xx
  • namespace declaration style not defined in editorconfig #35383

PullRequests

Created

  • Make NETSDK1083 link to RID doc #35546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rtm Branding #35538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35536
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35532
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix typo in MSBuildAllProject(File)s #35487
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template #35268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Razor server to quickly find dotnet.exe from VS #35499
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 6.0.22
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net7 wasm workload to the recognized list #35457
    untriaged
  • Create default.json file (targeted at 8.0.100) #35446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Include APICompat resources #35467
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Standardize error messages #33084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include NuGet.Packaging in ApiCompat.Task package #35507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35409
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35489
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

PullRequests

Updated

  • Collection expressions: construction #7541

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I've founded a C# code that crashes Visual Studio (and VS Code C# extension) #70027
  • Endless popup error messages #70025
  • Refactor -> Extract Method ignores namespace aliases #70024
  • Analyzer errors while working in Roslyn: VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer throws InvalidCastException #70015
  • Fast path check in TryCalculateRequiredMembers is overly broad #70013
  • Better support for looking up switch label symbols from `SemanticModel` #70012
  • Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source? #70011
  • Source generator started failing to load after VS update #70008
  • StackoverflowException when compiling VB.NET project #70007

Closed

  • Support go to definition (F12) for `goto` statements, navigating to the target label #69916
  • C# IDE0250 suggestion (make struct readonly) can cause CS8342 error (readonly struct can't contain field-like events) #69994
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70026
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Bump the NuGet.Frameworks version #70023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2271398 #70021
  • Optimize allocations in TextReader.ReadToEnd utilized by SourceText.From #70017
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow switch arms to start a line with an open brace #70014
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle property without accessors in `Binder.ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning` #70009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to work with interpolated strings. #70006
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for navigating to the definition of the target label of a `goto` #70020
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [Performance] Avoid 1GB of Enumerator boxing allocations #69972
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixup issue with incorrect solution handling in syncing tests. #70019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #70018
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move methods to more appropriate file #69999
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Performance] Avoid 500MB of HashSet enumerator allocations calling `Any` #69973
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7
  • Do not offer 'make struct readonly' when events are present #69998
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Support converting collection-initializers to collection-expressions in more cases. #69983
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having Space In Path Fails Builds On MacOS #50828
  • IHtmlContent can break ExceptionHandlerMiddleware and DeveloperExceptionPgaeMiddleware. Resulting in a blank page in production. #50825
  • URL for "/_framework..." flashes briefly in browser address bar when using streaming rendering & enhanced form handling with redirects in Blazor #50822
  • BlazorWasm build benchmark broken #50821
    8.0
  • [Antiforgery] Antiforgery middleware executes too early on the pipeline #50818
  • Inject CMS Content to Razor Components at compile time #50817
  • Map Razor Components collides with MapFallbackToPage #50816
  • UseHttpMethodOverride not working in .NET 8.0 RC1 #50815
  • Blazor WASM OIDC Authentication does not work with Zitadel Identity Provider #50812
  • Quarantine CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState(suppressEnhancedNavigation: False, renderMode: typeof(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.InteractiveAutoRenderMode), streaming: "AutoStreaming"/null) #50810
    8.0
  • Blazor Server architectural concerns #50808
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #50807
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #50806
  • Section outlet doesn't update when section content is rendered with streaming rendering #50804
    8.0-rc2
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50802

Closed

  • [Blazor] Please provide/expose current CSS identifier for CSS isolation #50820
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50805
  • Blazor component passed as cascading parameter is null when used in MainLayout.razor (.NET 8.0 RC 1) #50724
  • Missing .NET 8 RC Version for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm` #50791
  • Components with render attribute in the `LayoutComponentBase` are being recreated with each navigation #50766
  • Blazor antiforgery token issue when posting form (SSR) when user is logged in #50612
    8.0-rc2
  • BlazorWeb antiforgery issue on SignInAsync. #50760
  • [Regression] Error in HtmlRenderer when upgrading to net8 RC1 #50783
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #50729
  • Perf improvement: caching, mapaction #50770
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #50794

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2271271 #50824
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50823
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Stop processing original response streaming content if user has started navigating away #50814
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor

Created
